Properties.ProtectedString:
Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle") PlaySound = Handle:WaitForChild("PlaySound") Charging = Tool:WaitForChild("Charging")
Equipped = false MouseDown = false ParticlesCompleted = true Particles = {} CurrentCharge = 0 MaxCharge = 4
-- Returns a character ancestor and its Humanoid, or nil function FindCharacterAncestor(Parent) if Parent and Parent ~= game:GetService("Workspace") then local humanoid = Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid then return Parent, humanoid else return FindCharacterAncestor(Parent.Parent) end end return nil end
function CastLaser(StartPosition, Direction, MaxDistance, Ignore)
local function RayCast(Pos, Dir, Max, IgnoreList) return game:GetService("Workspace"):FindPartOnRayWithIgnoreList(Ray.new(Pos, Dir.unit * (Max or 999.999)), IgnoreList) end
local Hit, EndPosition = RayCast(StartPosition, Direction, MaxDistance, Ignore) local Distance = (StartPosition - EndPosition).magnitude local LaserPart = Instance.new("Part") LaserPart.Name = "CloverLaser" LaserPart.Transparency = 0.000001 LaserPart.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom LaserPart.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth LaserPart.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth LaserPart.Material = Enum.Material.SmoothPlastic LaserPart.CanCollide = false LaserPart.Anchored = true LaserPart.Locked = true LaserPart.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, Distance) local Mesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") Mesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh Mesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=149427420" Mesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=149427485" Mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(3, 1 + CurrentCharge, ((Distance * 2) + (Distance / 2) + (Distance / 6))) LaserPart.Size = Vector3.new(LaserPart.Size.X, (Mesh.Scale.Y / 4), LaserPart.Size.Z) Mesh.Parent = LaserPart Debris:AddItem(LaserPart, 1) LaserPart.Parent = Character LaserPart.CFrame = CFrame.new(StartPosition, EndPosition) * CFrame.new(0, 0, (-Distance / 2)) Spawn(function() for i = 1, 20 do wait(0.05) LaserPart.Transparency = LaserPart.Transparency + 0.05 end end)
return Hit, EndPosition, ChosenColor
end
function Fire() if Tool.Enabled and Humanoid.Health > 0 then Tool.Enabled = false
PlaySound.Value = "106018135"
local StartingPosition = Handle.Position + Handle.CFrame.lookVector * (Handle.Size.Z / 2)
local HandleClone = Handle:Clone() local HandleCloneY = HandleClone:Clone() HandleCloneY.CFrame = HandleCloneY.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(math.rad(90), 0, 0) HandleCloneY.CFrame = HandleCloneY.CFrame + HandleCloneY.CFrame.lookVector * ((HandleClone.Size.Y / 2) - 0.325) local HandleCloneZ = HandleCloneY:Clone() HandleCloneZ.CFrame = HandleCloneZ.CFrame + HandleClone.CFrame.lookVector * ((HandleClone.Size.Z / 2) + 0.05)
local Hit, EndPos = CastLaser(HandleCloneZ.CFrame.p, (Humanoid.TargetPoint - StartingPosition), 100, {Character})
local character, humanoid = FindCharacterAncestor(Hit)
if character and character.Parent and humanoid and humanoid.Parent then local creator_tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator_tag.Name = "creator" creator_tag.Value = Player Debris:AddItem(creator_tag, 2) creator_tag.Parent = humanoid humanoid:TakeDamage((1 + CurrentCharge) * 10) end
local CoinRadius = 5
for i = 1, (5 + math.random(0, 20)) do local Coin = Instance.new("Part") Coin.Material = Enum.Material.SmoothPlastic Coin.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom Coin.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Coin.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Coin.Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.4, 1) Coin.Name = "Coin" Coin.Anchored = false Coin.CanCollide = true Coin.Locked = true local Mesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") Mesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh Mesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=19059116" Mesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=19059111" Mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) Mesh.Parent = Coin Debris:AddItem(Coin, 10) Coin.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") Coin.CFrame = CFrame.new((EndPos.X + math.random(-CoinRadius, CoinRadius)), (EndPos.Y + math.random(0, CoinRadius)), (EndPos.Z + math.random(-CoinRadius, CoinRadius))) end
wait(1)
Tool.Enabled = true end end
function OnEquipped(Mouse) Equipped = true Character = Tool.Parent Humanoid = Character:WaitForChild("Humanoid") Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) if not Tool.Enabled then wait(0.5) Tool.Enabled = true end Mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() MouseDown = true Charging.Value = true while ((MouseDown or not ParticlesCompleted) and Equipped) do
local ParticleRadius = 3
local HandlePointClone = Handle:Clone() local HandlePointCloneY = HandlePointClone:Clone() HandlePointCloneY.CFrame = HandlePointCloneY.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(math.rad(90), 0, 0) HandlePointCloneY.CFrame = HandlePointCloneY.CFrame + HandlePointCloneY.CFrame.lookVector * ((HandlePointClone.Size.Y / 2) - 0.325) local HandlePointCloneZ = HandlePointCloneY:Clone() HandlePointCloneZ.CFrame = HandlePointCloneZ.CFrame + HandlePointClone.CFrame.lookVector * ((HandlePointClone.Size.Z / 2) + 0.05)
if MouseDown then ParticlesCompleted = false
for i = 1, math.random(2, 7) do local Particle = Instance.new("Part") Particle.Material = Enum.Material.SmoothPlastic Particle.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom Particle.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Particle.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Particle.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2) Particle.Name = "Particle" Particle.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Pastel Blue") Particle.Anchored = true Particle.CanCollide = false Particle.Locked = true local Mesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") Mesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.Sphere Mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(0.75, 0.75, 0.75) Mesh.Parent = Particle
local HandleClone = Handle:Clone() local HandleCloneY = HandleClone:Clone() HandleCloneY.CFrame = HandleCloneY.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(math.rad(90), 0, 0) HandleCloneY.CFrame = HandleCloneY.CFrame + HandleCloneY.CFrame.lookVector * ((HandleClone.Size.Y / 2) - 0.325 + math.random(-ParticleRadius, ParticleRadius)) local HandleCloneZ = HandleCloneY:Clone() HandleCloneZ.CFrame = HandleCloneZ.CFrame + HandleClone.CFrame.lookVector * ((HandleClone.Size.Z / 2) + 0.7 + math.random(-ParticleRadius, ParticleRadius)) local HandleCloneX = HandleCloneZ:Clone() HandleCloneX.CFrame = HandleCloneZ.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, math.rad(90), 0) HandleCloneX.CFrame = HandleCloneX.CFrame - HandleCloneX.CFrame.lookVector * ((HandleClone.Size.X / 2) + math.random(-ParticleRadius, ParticleRadius))
Debris:AddItem(Particle, 5)
Particle.Parent = Character Particle.CFrame = HandleCloneX.CFrame table.insert(Particles, Particle) end end for i, v in pairs(Particles) do v.CFrame = v.CFrame + CFrame.new(v.Position, HandlePointCloneZ.Position).lookVector * 0.5 if (v.Position - HandlePointCloneZ.Position).magnitude < 0.25 then v:Destroy() table.remove(Particles, i) if #Particles == 0 then ParticlesCompleted = true end end end
CurrentCharge = CurrentCharge + 0.05 if CurrentCharge >= MaxCharge then CurrentCharge = MaxCharge MouseDown = false end
wait(0.01) end Charging.Value = false if Equipped then Fire() end CurrentCharge = 0 end) Mouse.Button1Up:connect(function() MouseDown = false end) end
function OnUnequipped() Equipped = false MouseDown = false ParticlesCompleted = true for i, v in pairs(Particles) do v:Destroy() end Particles = {} Charging.Value = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(OnUnequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle") PlaySound = Handle:WaitForChild("PlaySound") Charging = Tool:WaitForChild("Charging") Charge = Handle:WaitForChild("Charge")
Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
PlaySound.Changed:connect(function() if PlaySound.Value ~= "" then local SoundId = PlaySound.Value PlaySound.Value = "" local Sound = Instance.new("Sound") Sound.Looped = false Sound.Pitch = 0.5 Sound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=" .. SoundId Sound.PlayOnRemove = false Sound.Volume = 1 Debris:AddItem(Sound, 3) Sound.Parent = Handle wait() Sound:Play() end end)
Charging.Changed:connect(function() if Charging.Value then Charge:Play() else Charge:Stop() end end)
